entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Rain beginning early this afternoon. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water this evening. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
